Hereâ€™s a simple chart rendered statically.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.DataFrame({"x": range(10), "y": [v*v for v in range(10)]})
df.head()
```

```{python}
plt.plot(df["x"], df["y"])
plt.title("y = x^2")
plt.xlabel("x"); plt.ylabel("y")
plt.show()
```
